answers.answer: I'm going through EVERYTHING that's in this post (except the gestational diabetes) but I totally understand where you're coming from I have a 5 yr old son and I'm 34+4 weeks and im also having a girl, this pregnancy has been a VERY tiresome one and I just can't wait until everything is over with so I could start getting back to my normal self!

Im so glad Im not alone. I thought maybe my hormones were just insane. I had a company picnic last night. It almost gave me an anxiety attack. It was nice but I had my 4year old in a million dollar home. It was hot and I was so uncomfortable.  I left before everyone else. I felt horrible but by the time I got home and got my son in bed I was worn out. Im glad I am not the only worn out momma so early.

I just found I have the gestational diabetes and I'm 33 wks how do you keep it under control or does the medicine help you period bc I just found out Wednesday but they didn't give me any medicine I have a appointment tomorrow in the morning to meet up with the specialist .

I have to watch what I eat. Really just cutting back my carbs. I take the medication bc my fasting morning numbers wouldnt go down. I will suggest eating sinner as early as you can. I normally dont get to eat till 7-9 ish and it makes my fast in morning numbers higher.

question: So I am 34 weeks pregnant with my second child. Our little girl has put me through a whirlwind. I am getting so tired of being pregnant. I found out at 27 weeks that I had gestational diabetes. I have been able to keep my numbers low most of the time with the help of my medication. But I am ready to be able to eat my cereal or a cheese burger without knowing I will feel horrible afterwards. I also am more than ready to be able to have sex with my husband and enjoy it again. We still have sex but it is not enjoyable for me or him. Its more just to get the job done for him. I try so hard to enjoy it but NOTHING!!! My husband and I never had a problem with sex before this pregnancy. Now its all screwed up. I dream about having sex like we use to and that only makes it worse. I am so excited and scared to be having a daughter. I have a 4 year old son now and I am hoping I can be a good mother to my daughter and son both. Sorry. This is probably a silly vent
title: Need to release some frustrations.
